br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.modifiers

Class Modifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.modifiers.Modifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmountModifier, InventoryModifier, PathModifier, QuestModifier, UnlockModifier

    public abstract class Modifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json.Serializable
    A Modifier is used by scenes, items and events to affect the player's status in some way, such as increasing maximum health and modifying the inventory.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns a text describing the modifier's effect (e.g., 'You have won 10 experience points!').
      abstract void modify()
      Activate the modifier's effect.
